synopsis:
Set in a different Tokyo in a different world than ours, the story follows Tokunana, a unit of assembled misfits in the Metropolitan Police Department. Tokunana battles against "Nine" â€” an organization committing crimes in their zealous worship of the dragons that once roamed the world.

(Source: ANN)

title.jp: Keishichou Tokumubu Tokushu Kyouakuhan Taisakushitsu Dainanaka: Tokunana
